author: Dave Carter
review: Pinewood apartments..water pouring out of the ceiling and walls, mold inside the walls, all over the interior walls, 5 months of trying to get it fixed and habitable..their response was..we did enough, now get out.  Nothing but rudeness and

author: Maggie Marie
review: Professional, efficient, reasonably priced, well maintained units with a large variety of rentals, but seems to be difficult to locate an open unit. The demand is extremely high due to military presence in town.

author: David Coleman
review: I'd rent from them again. I had zero problems during my lease. They were always very fast responding to maintenance issues. I got my full deposit back without any nit-picking. The only gripe was that it wasn't totally clean when I moved in

author: Alex Love
review: This is without a doubt the worst and most dishonest, manipulative property management that I have ever delt with. Do not trust these people. They will do anything they can to screw you over. If I could give zero stars I would.

author: Charles R.
review: Island Property Management is currently listing a house which has termites, improperly exposed wiring, and no central heating

author: Halston
review: I appreciate how kind they were on the phone about using my voucher*

author: Mel Noelle
review: Best rental angency in town, hands down. Kindest, most professional, most fair prices, most responsible, absolutely the best.

author: PS4 Gamers
review: Management is amazing. Ladies in the office are really nice.
